sorcer.core.provider

Class ProviderDelegate.DeploymentConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.core.provider.ProviderDelegate.DeploymentConfiguration
  • Enclosing class:
    ProviderDelegate

    public class ProviderDelegate.DeploymentConfiguration
extends Object
    The configuration class for SORCER providers. This configuration collects the configuration settings for all SORCER service providers. It uses the provider properties file and/or Jini configuration file. The global environment properties are copied from this configuration to the SorcerEnv properties.

      • loadConfiguration

        public void loadConfiguration(String filename)
        Loads provider properties from a filename file. By default a provider loads its properties from provider.properties file located in the provider's package. Also, a provider properties file name can be specified as a variable providerProperties in a Jini configuration file for a SORCER provider. In this case the provider loads properties from the specified providerProperties file. Properties are available from the instance field props field and accessible calling the getProperty(String) method.
        Parameters:
        filename - the properties file name
        See Also:
        getProperty(java.lang.String)

      • getProviderProperties

        public Properties getProviderProperties()

      • getProperty

        public String getProperty(String key)
        Returns a value of a comma separated property as defined in. If the property value is not defined for the delegate's provider then the equivalent SORCR environment value value is returned. SorcerConstants.
        Parameters:
        key - a property (attribute)
        Returns:
        a property value
